title: Chung Mong-joon: FIFA President a hypocrite and liar
text:
Chung Mong-joon: FIFA President a hypocrite and liar 
CCTV.com Share this: Share on twitter Share on facebook Share on sinaweibo Share on email Font size: 
The noose around FIFA president Sepp Blatter's neck is tightening after Chung Mong-joon, a South Korean contender for the FIFA presidency, called the Swiss a hypocrite and a liar and says he is planning to sue him for at least 100 million dollars. 
This latest attack comes on the heels of Coca-Cola, McDonald's, and other major FIFA sponsors calling for Blatter to step down, amidst new reports that he is facing a provisional 90 day suspension from the FIFA Ethics Committtee. "Mr. Blatter, in short, is a hypocrite and a liar. Whenever I speak to football leaders - most of them agree that Blatter is corrupt. But they never speak out. They would rather hide behind a curtain of fear and contempt," Chung Mong-joon said. 
"Back in 2002, during an ExCo meeting, I asked president Blatter his salary and expenses but he refused. Naturally for president Blatter to paid without ExCo approval is embezzlement. That is why I plan to sue Mr Blatter on his embezzlement in court." Related Videos
